definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 约翰可算是个倒运的预言家。

sentences.english: The prophets of doom back up their figures with tales of woe.
sentences.chinese: 悲观的预言家用悲观的故事支持他们的数据。

sentences.english: Michel de Nostredame (aka Nostradamus) was a 16th-century French "seer."
sentences.chinese: 诺查丹玛斯是十六世纪法国的大预言家。

sentences.english: Interesting is how the doomsayers' predictions never seem to come true.
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，末日预言家们的预言似乎从来没有正确过。

sentences.english: Don't predict the future, create it!
sentences.chinese: 企业家不要扮成预言家装神弄鬼。

sentences.english: The execrations of the prophet terrified the sinful multitude .
sentences.chinese: 那个预言家的咒诅吓坏了充满罪恶的群众。

sentences.english: Now this Centaur was a prophet as a good many Centaurs are.
sentences.chinese: 却说这怪物是个预言家，就像许多优秀的人马那样。

sentences.english: I bear witness that President Kimball is a prophet.
sentences.chinese: 我向你作证金博尔总统是一个预言家。

sentences.english: Monnet was that rarest of all prophets who put people at ease .
sentences.chinese: 在让人民放心的预言家中，莫内特是最少见的。

sentences.english: People have always paid honor to historians, but ignored prophets.
sentences.chinese: 人们总是礼敬历史学家，冷落预言家。

sentences.english: We don't have many seers these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今我们的社会却没有那么多的预言家。

definition: Sherlock Holmes, 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯[Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1]
